page.title: 02The People of Droylsden
page.content: The Droylsden people are very friendly and sociable. The people walk on the streets without any shame. Some of the older people would rather live in the past. Droylsden is a residential area with semi-detached and terraced houses. Apart from one factory and two schools there are open spaces with fields, trees and parkland. There is also a canal running all the way into Manchester.All of the people are on the same level and nothing in the park is too scruffy to play on. The people in the shops are friendly and pleased to serve you. There is little vandalism. The people seem happy with their town, they always say how nice the town of Droylsden is. Old people's homes share a part of the area as well. Youth clubs keep the youths away from trouble.
